definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Through the analysis of personnel, indicating the Way of Heaven not be trusted.
sentences.chinese: 通过对人事的分析，说明天道不可信。

sentences.english: To retire after success is the tao of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 功成而身退，这才合于天道。

sentences.english: Is John coming with us for lunch ?
sentences.chinese: 约翰要跟我们天道去吃午饭吗？

sentences.english: As for the Dao of governance, both of them take the idea that human conducts should be in conformity with the Dao of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 在治道观上，两者均取推天道以明人事的思维取象。

sentences.english: Providence entrusted the United States to be the guardian of liberty.
sentences.chinese: 天道之托让美国成为自由的守护者。

sentences.english: I believe God will help me, too. will you bless me, too?
sentences.chinese: 相信天道酬勤，你会祝福我吗？

sentences.english: Laozi' dao is derived from the further interpretation of Way of Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 老子的“道”是对“天道”加以进一步抽象所得。

sentences.english: Who pleasure, not intentional of heaven, the Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 天道，只顾享乐，无心修佛。

sentences.english: It sides only with the good man.
New opportunities and challenges in the next, God rewards the diligent.
sentences.chinese: 在新的机遇和挑战下，天道酬勤。

sentences.english: This tradition can be summarized as "Tiandao".
sentences.chinese: 这个传统可以“天道”概括。

sentences.english: This is the most outstanding thought of the nature of law reflected in "Book of Changes".
sentences.chinese: 这是《易经》所体现的最突出的天道观思想。

sentences.english: I believe that the God rewards the diligent.
In contrast, Westerners think that Heaven is more near-human.
sentences.chinese: 与此不同，西方人则认为天道更近于人道。

sentences.english: It is this question triggered a traditional Chinese philosophy of Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 正是这一追问引发了中国传统哲学中的天道观。

definition: time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
good luck/Nature (as the mother of all things)
Xuan Yuan, personal name of Huangdi, the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]
saint/sage/refers to Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]/the current reigning Emperor
human sympathy/humanitarianism/humane/the "human way", one of the stages in the cycle of reincarnation (Buddhism)/sexual intercourse
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
